name: This Way Up [LDJam42]
description:
Top down, multiplayer, couch game you can enjoy with 2-4 friends. Load up delivery trucks with packages with the help of your friends before the trucks leave. Work fast for the packages could clutter up the warehouse, look out for a flamethrower to clear up some space.

The Open Window LD42 Jam game. Students and lecturers came together to create a top-down couch game you can enjoy with 2-4 friends or solo for a more challenging experience.


Game controls (2-4 players):

  • L Analog - Move
  • R Trigger - Run
  • A - Pickup/Drop
  • Start - Pause

Game controls (Keyboard - 1 player):

  • Tab - Character Switch
  • WASD - Move
  • LShift - Run
  • LClick - Pickup/Drop
  • Esc - Pause

Objective:

  • Load up delivery trucks with packages with the help of your friends before the trucks leave
  • Work fast for the packages could clutter up the warehouse, look out for a flamethrower to clear up some space.
  • Use the lift when you feel like it or if something drops
